bibl.title: "He archaia sophistike". The Sophistic Movement. Papers read at the First International Symposium on the Sophistic movement. Athens, 27-29 September 1982
bibl.note: P. Oxy. XI, 1364 et XV, 1797 (= Pack2 92-93) = fr. 44 Diels-Kranz. - Cf. aussi Harry C. Avery, One Antiphon or two?, Hermes 110 (1982) pp. 145-158.
Decleva Caizzi Fernanda, Le fragment 44 D.-K. d'Antiphon et le problème de son auteur: quelques reconsidérations.
"He archaia sophistike". The Sophistic Movement. Papers read at the First International Symposium on the Sophistic movement. Athens, 27-29 September 1982 (Athens, 1984) pp. 96-107.
